sentences: Greg Gall (born December 29, 1965 in Tampa, Florida) is a drummer, formerly with the death metal band, Six Feet Under.
He does not play the classic death metal style of drumming (blast beats).
He uses more of a traditional drum approach, but with the addition of speed, and has very quick feet on the double bass pedals.
Gall is married and has one child, and is the brother-in-law to bandmate Terry Butler.
